episode.title: 好きな子と新学期を迎えた
The Girl I Like and I Welcomed the New School Term
Suki na Ko to Shingakki o Mukaeta
episode.summary: A year has passed since Komura fell helplessly into Mie`s glassesless eyes. A new term has come, and with it new seats. Will Komura and Mie be separated? Will a new deskmate fall for Mie? Will Komura be able to focus long enough to find out? Source: crunchyroll
